block, bfq: fix uaf for bfqq in bfq_exit_icq_bfqq

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v6.0.17 by commit cfe5b38c37720313eff0dec5517442c7ab3c9a20, it was introduced in version v6.0.16 by commit b22fd72bfebda3956efc4431b60ddfc0a51e03e0. For more details please see the references link.
summary: block, bfq: fix uaf for bfqq in bfq_exit_icq_bfqq
